{{TOC|right}}

A damage type [[Tag (Java Edition)|tag]] is a group of [[damage type]]s. Damage type tags can be used when testing for damage type arguments with {{cd|#{{ph|resource location}}}}, which succeeds if the damage type matches any of the damage types specified in the tag.

== List of tags ==
=== always_hurts_ender_dragons ===
Damage from these types is always dealt to Ender Dragons, even if not dealt by a player

{{tag_list|always_hurts_ender_dragons|type=damage_type
|#is_explosion
}}

=== always_kills_armor_stands ===
Destroys [[armor stand]]s in one hit.

{{tag_list|always_kills_armor_stands|type=damage_type
|arrow
|trident
|fireball
|wither_skull
|wind_charge
}}

=== always_most_significant_fall ===
Used to show the correct death message

{{tag_list|always_most_significant_fall|type=damage_type
|out_of_world
}}

=== always_triggers_silverfish ===
Damage from these types always makes silverfishes notify nearby hidden silverfishes.

{{tag_list|always_triggers_silverfish|type=damage_type
|magic
}}

=== avoids_guardian_thorns ===
Damage from these types does not trigger the guardian Thorns damage for the attacker.

{{tag_list|avoids_guardian_thorns|type=damage_type
|magic
|thorns
|#is_explosion
}}

=== bypasses_cooldown ===
Damage types with this tag bypass the regular invincibility time after taking damage.

{{tag_list|bypasses_cooldown|type=damage_type
}}

=== bypasses_effects ===
Damage from these types bypasses any damage reduction (Resistance effect and enchantments).

{{tag_list|bypasses_effects|type=damage_type
|starve
}}

=== bypasses_enchantments ===
Damage from these types bypasses enchantments damage reduction.

{{tag_list|bypasses_enchantments|type=damage_type
|sonic_boom
}}

=== bypasses_invulnerability ===
Damage from these types bypasses invulnerabilities like creative one.

{{tag_list|bypasses_invulnerability|type=damage_type
|out_of_world
|generic_kill
}}

=== bypasses_resistance ===
Damage from these types bypasses Resistance effect damage reduction.

{{tag_list|bypasses_resistance|type=damage_type
|out_of_world
|generic_kill
}}

Damage from these types does not get blocked by shields.

Damage from these types damages helmets by the amount of damage and then reduced by 25%.

{{Info needed}}

{{tag_list|ignites_armor_stands|type=damage_type
|in_fire

=== is_drowning ===
Damage types with this tag are ignored if the {{cd|drowningDamage}} [[game rule]] is set to false, or if the player has the [[Water Breathing]] potion effect.

{{tag_list|is_drowning|type=damage_type
|drown
}}

=== is_explosion ===
Damage from these types is reduced by the [[Blast Protection]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|is_explosion|type=damage_type
|fireworks
|explosion
|player_explosion
|bad_respawn_point
}}

=== is_fall ===
Damage types with this tag are ignored if the {{cd|fallDamage}} [[game rule]] is set to false, or if the player has the [[Slow Falling]] potion effect. Damage from these types is reduced by the [[Feather Falling]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|is_fall|type=damage_type
|fall
|ender_pearl
|stalagmite
}}

=== is_fire ===
Damage types with this tag are ignored if the {{cd|fireDamage}} [[game rule]] is set to false, or if the player has the [[Fire Resistance]] potion effect. Any damage received is reduced by the [[Fire Protection]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|is_fire|type=damage_type
|in_fire
|campfire
|on_fire
|lava
|hot_floor
|unattributed_fireball
|fireball
}}

=== is_freezing ===
Damage types with this tag are ignored if the {{cd|freezeDamage}} [[game rule]] is set to false, or if the player is wearing any piece of [[leather armor]].

{{tag_list|is_freezing|type=damage_type
|freeze
}}

=== is_lightning ===
Used to make turtles drop bowls when killed by lightning.

{{tag_list|is_lightning|type=damage_type
|lightning_bolt
}}

=== is_player_attack ===
{{Info needed}}

{{tag_list|is_player_attack|type=damage_type
|player_attack
|spear
|mace_smash
}}

=== is_projectile ===
* Used in many advancements
* Used to check if Endermen should teleport
* Used to check if Shulkers were hit by a projectile (then checked if the projectile is a shulker bullet to duplicate them)
* Damage from these types is reduced by the [[Projectile Protection]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|is_projectile|type=damage_type
|arrow
|trident
|mob_projectile
|unattributed_fireball
|fireball
|wither_skull
|thrown
|wind_charge
}}

{{Info needed}}

{{tag_list|mace_smash|type=damage_type
|mace_smash
}}

=== no_anger ===
Prevents entities from storing the last entity that hurt them, thus preventing anger.

{{tag_list|no_anger|type=damage_type
|mob_attack_no_aggro
}}

=== no_impact ===
Prevents entities from being hurt marked, preventing the server from syncing the velocity to the client.

{{tag_list|no_impact|type=damage_type
|drown
}}
